page.title: 06Health
page.content: As there is no Health Centre in the area, local people are normally registered with Doctors and Dentists in Dundee or Forfar. Hospitals are also centred in Dundee, the two main general hospitals being Ninewells and Dundee Royal Infirmary. There is a Health Clinic at Whitfield, Dundee, which is a local base for the School Doctor, Dentist, Nurses and Health Visitors. Routine medical inspections for pupils are carried out annually by the School Doctor and Nurse, while the School Dentist visits each of the schools twice per session with a mobile surgery to carry out inspections and treatments. Pupils' eyesight and hearing are checked annually by an orthoptist and audiographer.
